Alignment module¶

class src.alignment.Alignment(score, query_residues, template_name, template_residues)[source]¶
class Alignment¶

This class groups informations about an alignment.

score¶

Score of the alignment

query_residues¶

Query’s sequence of residues as list of Residues objects

template¶

Instance of a Template object as Template(template_name, template_residues)

calculate_energy(dist_range, gap_penalty, dope_dict)[source]¶

Calculate the matrix of distances of pair residues of the query sequence, using the coordinates of the template sequence: threading of the query on the template sequence. The distance calculation is optimized. The calculated distance is then convert into a dope energy value.

Parameters:
  • dist_range (list of int) – Range of distances in angströms. Distances within this range only are taken into account
  • gap_penalty (int) – Gap penalty
  • dope_dict (dictionary) – A dictionary with key = res_1-res_2 and value = an array of 30 dope energy values.
Returns:

2D matrix containing energy between pairs of residues

of the query sequence threaded on the template.
Return type:

numpy 2D array
write_pdb(pdb_path)[source]¶

Write a pdb file by threading the query sequence on the template CA coordinates.

Parameters:pdb_path (str) – Path of the pdb file to create.
Returns:void
